reviews.review_msg: I don't think there's a point to his lectures; extremely unstructured, no AV whatsoever. No overheads, nothing. Readings are irrelevent. Some comments made in class by him were fallacious, and I did x-reference. At this point, I can't really trust anything he says. I feel like I've lowered my intelligence by forcing myself to sit through his class.
Horrible. Not clear at all in his lectures and he goes on and on about nothing in particular. Want a sleeper? Take his class.

I didn;t mind his class. He makes things interesting by telling stories and bashing americans. Not much point to do readings though, and lectures were sometimes pointless. But overall I think hes not a bad prof
Is not actually available when you ask for help. Heard through other students as well as experienced myself him not responding to emails when asking questions about assignments. Not helpful.
James is an incredible lecturer. It's like watching Morgan Freeman and Forest Whitaker. I was hoping for an A mark, but received a B mark. Pol Sci is not my major, but I did try my best.
